header_input01.en: Please enter the singer and the song.

login_text.zh: 請輸入email及密碼，進行登入。
login_text.en: Please enter your email and password to log in.

Nav_P.zh: 只要登入帳戶，就能享受建立及分享播放清單、取得個人化推薦內容。
Nav_P.en: Sign in to create & share playlists.

main1_2_title.en: Tell us which artists you like.

main1_2_text.zh: 創造專屬自己的專輯。馬上來體驗吧!
main1_2_text.en: We'll create an experience just for you.

help_About_text1.zh:
Rhythm Galaxy 是一個跨越音樂類型與形式的節奏宇宙。
我們為每一位聽眾與創作者，打造一個能自由探索、分享與沉浸的音樂空間。
從流行樂、嘻哈到輕音樂，從排行榜熱歌到獨立聲音，這裡收錄的不只是音樂，而是你的情感、記憶與故事。
無論你想發現新歌、建立自己的播放清單，還是收聽深度 Podcast 節目，Rhythm Galaxy 都是你專屬的聲音宇宙。
讓節奏引領你，展開一場音樂的星際之旅。
help_About_text1.en:
Rhythm Galaxy is a universe built for music lovers and creators to explore, share, and immerse in sound.
From chart-topping hits to indie gems, from relaxing light music to energizing hip-hop beats, we bring together a world of rhythm — all in one place.
Discover new songs, build your personalized playlists, or dive into thought-provoking podcasts.
Let the rhythm guide you through your own journey across the galaxy of sound.

help_MST_text1.zh:
Rhythm Galaxy 會員服務條款
最後更新日期：2025 年 7 月 4 日
歡迎使用 Rhythm Galaxy（以下簡稱「本平台」）所提供之服務。為保障您的權益，請詳細閱讀下列會員服務條款（以下簡稱「本條款」）。
當您註冊成為會員，即表示您已閱讀、瞭解並同意遵守本條款之所有內容。
※本網站是草稿網站非營利
help_MST_text1.en:
Rhythm Galaxy Terms of Service
Last Updated: July 4, 2025
Welcome to Rhythm Galaxy (the “Platform”). These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of all services provided by Rhythm Galaxy.
By registering as a member, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms.
※This website is a non-profit draft and is not intended for commercial purposes.

help_MST_text2.zh:
一、會員註冊與帳戶管理
1. 使用本平台前，您需註冊成為會員並提供完整、正確的個人資訊。
2. 您應妥善保管您的帳號與密碼，所有經由您帳號進行之行為，將視為您本人行為。
3. 若發現帳號遭他人未經授權使用，應立即通知本平台客服。
help_MST_text2.en:
Ⅰ. Account Registration and Management
1. You must register and provide accurate, complete personal information to use our services.
2. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
3. If you suspect unauthorized use of your account, please contact our support team immediately.

help_MST_text3.zh:
二、服務內容與使用限制
1. 本平台提供音樂播放、Podcast 節目、個人播放清單、媒體收藏等服務內容。
2. 會員不得將本平台內容作為商業用途，或以任何非法方式使用平台資源。
3. 本平台保留隨時調整、修改或終止部分或全部服務之權利。
help_MST_text3.en:
Ⅱ. Services and Usage Restrictions
1. The Platform offers music streaming, podcast access, personal playlists, and media library features.
2. You may not use the Platform for commercial purposes or engage in any illegal activity through the services.
3. Rhythm Galaxy reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the services at any time without notice.

help_MST_text4.zh:
三、智慧財產權
1. 本平台內所有內容，包括但不限於音樂、圖像、文字、介面設計、商標等，其智慧財產權均為本平台或原創作者所有。
2. 未經授權，會員不得複製、傳播、散布、公開播送或以任何方式使用本平台之內容。
help_MST_text4.en:
Ⅲ. Intellectual Property Rights
1. All content on the Platform—including but not limited to music, artwork, text, interface designs, and trademarks—is the intellectual property of Rhythm Galaxy or the original creators.
2. You may not reproduce, distribute, broadcast, or otherwise use any content without prior authorization.

help_MST_text5.zh:
四、會員義務與責任
1. 會員應遵守中華民國相關法律及本條款之規定。
2. 會員不得從事任何干擾、破壞平台運作或影響其他使用者權益之行為。
3. 若會員違反本條款，本平台有權停止其帳號或限制其使用服務。
help_MST_text5.en:
Ⅳ. User Responsibilities
1. You must comply with all applicable laws and these Terms while using the Platform.
2. You agree not to interfere with the Platform’s operations or disrupt other users’ experiences.
3. Violations of these Terms may result in suspension or termination of your account.

help_MST_text6.zh:
五、隱私權保護
我們尊重您的個人資料，所有資訊將依據《隱私權政策》進行蒐集、處理與使用。詳細內容請參閱本平台之【隱私權政策】。
help_MST_text6.en:
Ⅴ. Privacy Protection
Your personal data is important to us. All information is collected, processed, and used in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which we encourage you to review in full.

help_MST_text7.zh:
六、條款修改
本平台有權隨時修改本條款，修改後將公告於網站，您繼續使用本服務即視為同意該修改。
help_MST_text7.en:
Ⅵ. Modifications to Terms
We reserve the right to revise these Terms at any time. Changes will be posted on the Platform. Continued use of the services constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

help_MST_text8.zh:
📢若有任何問題，歡迎與我們聯繫：
📧 客服信箱：bifi112537@gmail.com
help_MST_text8.en:
📢If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use our services.
📧 Contact Us:bifi112537@gmail.com

help_PPP_text1.zh:
最後更新日期：2025 年 7 月 4 日
Rhythm Galaxy（以下簡稱「本平台」）非常重視使用者的隱私與個人資料保護。
本政策說明我們如何蒐集、使用、儲存及保護您在使用本網站與服務時所提供的資訊。
help_PPP_text1.en:
Last Updated: July 4, 2025
Rhythm Galaxy (“we”, “our”, or “the Platform”) is committed to protecting your privacy.
This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your personal information when you use our services.

help_PPP_text2.zh:
一、我們收集的資料
· 註冊資料（如：姓名、電子信箱）
· 使用紀錄與偏好設定（如：收藏清單、播放紀錄）
· 瀏覽行為分析（用於改善平台體驗）
help_PPP_text2.en:
Ⅰ. We may collect the following types of information:
· Registration details (e.g. name, email address)
· Usage data and preferences (e.g. playlists, listening history)
· Browsing behavior (for improving user experience)

help_PPP_text3.zh:
二、資料使用方式
· 提供與改善平台功能
· 客服聯繫與會員通知
· 分析使用行為以優化推薦內容
· 遵守法律規範
help_PPP_text3.en:
Ⅱ. We use your information to:
· Provide and enhance our services
· Contact you regarding support or important updates
· Analyze user behavior to personalize your experience
· Comply with legal obligations

help_PPP_text4.zh:
三、資料分享與第三方服務
我們不會在未經您同意的情況下出售或交換您的個人資料。部分服務可能會使用第三方工具（如分析服務），這些工具將依自身隱私條款處理資料。
help_PPP_text4.en:
Ⅲ. Sharing with Third Parties
We do not sell or trade your personal data. Some features may involve third-party services (e.g., analytics tools), which handle data in accordance with their own privacy policies.

help_PPP_text5.zh:
四、資料儲存與安全
我們採取合理的技術與管理措施保護您的個人資料不被未授權存取、使用或洩漏。
help_PPP_text5.en:
Ⅳ. Data Storage & Security
We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

help_PPP_text6.zh:
五、使用者權利
您有權查詢、修改或刪除您的個人資料。如您希望行使相關權利，請透過客服聯繫我們。
help_PPP_text6.en:
Ⅴ. Your Rights
You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Please contact us if you wish to make any changes.

help_PPP_text7.zh:
六、草稿網站聲明
本網站為草稿網站，僅用於展示與非營利測試之目的，未進行實際資料商業處理。
help_PPP_text7.en:
Ⅵ. Prototype Disclaimer
This website is a prototype for demonstration and non-commercial testing purposes only. No actual personal data is used for commercial processing.

help_PPP_text8.zh:
📢如您對本隱私政策有任何疑問，歡迎來信：
📧 客服信箱：bifi112537@gmail.com
help_PPP_text8.en:
📢If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use our services.
📧 Contact Us:bifi112537@gmail.com

help_CPM_text1.zh:
最後更新：2025 年 7 月 4 日
Rhythm Galaxy 重視並尊重所有創作者與內容提供者的智慧財產權。
為保障原創內容、合法使用與創作者權益，本平台採取以下著作權保護措施：
help_CPM_text1.en:
Last Updated: July 4, 2025
Rhythm Galaxy values and respects the intellectual property rights of all creators and content providers.
To protect original works and ensure lawful use, we have implemented the following copyright protection measures:

help_CPM_text2.zh:
Rhythm Galaxy 網站所使用之音樂與素材，均來自無版權音樂來源或公有領域，並遵守其使用規範。
本網站目前不開放使用者上傳音樂內容，因此不涉及使用者產生內容之著作權風險。
若您認為本站某項內容仍涉及著作權爭議，請透過以下信箱與我們聯繫，我們將立即處理並配合下架：
📧 聯絡信箱：bifi112537@gmail.com
help_CPM_text2.en:
All music and media used on Rhythm Galaxy are sourced from royalty-free libraries or public domain materials, in compliance with their respective usage licenses.
At this time, the platform does not allow users to upload their own audio content, eliminating risks related to user-generated copyright issues.
If you believe any material on our website violates your copyright, please contact us and we will promptly investigate and take appropriate action.
📧 Contact Email: bifi112537@gmail.com

help_CPM_text3.zh: ※ 本網站內容使用來源皆為無版權音樂，僅供展示與非商業使用。
help_CPM_text3.en: ※ This site uses royalty-free audio for non-commercial demonstration purposes.

help_Disclaimer_text1.zh:
Rhythm Galaxy 為一個非營利、草稿性質之網站，主要用於展示設計概念與測試平台功能。
網站中所使用之音樂、圖片與媒體內容，皆來自無版權來源或公有領域，並依照各資源授權規範使用。
本網站僅供學習與展示用途，不對內容之完整性、即時性或正確性作出保證，亦不構成任何商業行為或法律建議。
使用者瀏覽本網站即表示了解並同意：
· 本平台不對因使用本網站資料而產生之任何直接或間接損失負責。
· Rhythm Galaxy 對於任何第三方網站連結或資源亦不負責任。
如您發現任何可能涉及侵權或不當使用之內容，請即時與我們聯繫，我們將儘速處理。
📧 聯絡信箱：bifi112537@gmail.com
help_Disclaimer_text1.en:
Rhythm Galaxy is a non-commercial, prototype website created for educational and demonstration purposes only.
All music, images, and media featured on the site are sourced from royalty-free or public domain resources, used in accordance with their respective licenses.
This site makes no guarantees regarding the completeness, accuracy, or timeliness of its content and does not constitute any form of legal or commercial advice.
By using this website, you acknowledge and agree that:
· Rhythm Galaxy shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of the site or its content.
· We are not responsible for the content or reliability of any third-party websites linked from this platform.
If you believe any content on this site infringes upon your rights, please contact us immediately and we will take prompt action.
📧 Contact Email: bifi112537@gmail.com

help_FAQ_text1.zh:
Rhythm Galaxy 是什麼？
Rhythm Galaxy 是一個以節奏、音樂與創意為核心的網站平台，目前處於非營利草稿階段，主要用於展示設計概念與功能雛形。
help_FAQ_text1.en:
What is Rhythm Galaxy?
Rhythm Galaxy is a music-focused platform designed around rhythm and creativity.
It is currently a non-commercial prototype site used to showcase design concepts and early features.

help_FAQ_text2.zh:
Q. 音樂來源是什麼？
A. 我們使用的音樂來自無版權音樂庫與公有領域素材，皆遵守原始授權規範。
help_FAQ_text2.en:
Q. Where does the music come from?
A. All music is sourced from royalty-free libraries or public domain materials, used in compliance with their respective licenses.

help_FAQ_text3.zh:
Q. Rhythm Galaxy 是否提供商業服務？
A. 本站目前為非營利展示用途，不進行商業營運。
help_FAQ_text3.en:
Q. Is Rhythm Galaxy a commercial service?
A. No, this is a non-commercial prototype site with no active business operations.

help_FAQ_text4.zh:
Q. 我發現某些內容可能有版權疑慮，該怎麼辦？
A. 請立即來信告知我們，我們將儘速處理並移除相關內容。
📧 聯絡信箱: bifi112537@gmail.com
help_FAQ_text4.en:
Q. What if I find a copyright issue on the site?
A. Please email us right away. We will review and take appropriate action as soon as possible.
📧 Contact Email: bifi112537@gmail.com

help_FAQ_text5.zh:
Q. 未來會開放哪些功能？
A. 我們正在規劃更多互動功能，包括播放清單管理、使用者個人化頁面與節奏可視化動畫等，敬請期待！
help_FAQ_text5.en:
Q. What features are planned for the future?
A. We’re planning to add features such as playlist customization, user profiles, and rhythm visualizations. Stay tuned!

help_FAQ_text6.zh:
Q. 我可以在哪裡聯絡您？
A. 歡迎透過電子郵件聯繫我們：📧 聯絡信箱: bifi112537@gmail.com
help_FAQ_text6.en:
Q. How can I contact you?
A. 📧 Contact Email: bifi112537@gmail.com
You’re welcome to reach out via email at the address above.

help_help_text1.zh: 歡迎透過電子郵件聯繫我們：📧 聯絡信箱: bifi112537@gmail.com
help_help_text1.en:

You’re welcome to reach out via email at the address above.
